Verses: 1 yOsiyaa raajaavaagiRapOdhu, ettu vayadhaayirundhu, muppaththoru varusham erusalEmil arasaaNdaan; pOSkaadh ooraanaagiya adhaayaavin kumaaraththiyaana avan thaayin pEr edhidhaaL.
2 avan karththarin paarvaikku semmaiyaanadhai seydhu, than thagappanaagiya dhaaveedhin vazhiyilellaam valadhu idadhupuRam vilagaamal nadandhaan.
3 raajaavaagiya yOsiyaavin padhinettaam varushaththilE, raajaa mesullaamin kumaaranaagiya adhsaliyaavin magan saappaan ennum sambiradhiyaik karththarin aalayaththukku anuppi:

4 nee pradhaana aasaariyanaagiya ilkkiyaavinidaththil pOi, karththarudaiya aalayaththukkuk koNduvarappattadhum vaasalkaakkiRavargaL janaththin kaiyilE vaangappattadhumaana paNaththai  avan thokaipaarththu,

5 piRpaadu avargaL adhaik karththarudaiya aalayaththin vElaiyai visaarikkiRavargaL kaiyilE koduththu, avargaL adhaik karththarin aalayaththaip pazhudhu paarkkiRadhaRkaaga adhilirukkiRa vElaikkaararaagiya,
6 thachcharukkum, siRpaasaarigaLukkum, kotrarukkum, aalayaththaip pazhudhu paarkkumpadi vENdiya marangaLaiyum vettina kaRkaLaiyum vaangugiRadhaRkum selavazhikkavENdum.
7 aagilum andhap paNaththaith thangaL kaiyil oppuviththukkoLLugiRavargaLO kaariyaththai uNmaiyaai nadappikkiRapadiyinaal, avargaLidaththil adhin kaNakkaik kEtkavENdiyadhillai endru sol endraan.

8 appozhudhu pradhaana aasaariyanaagiya ilkkiyaa sambiradhiyaagiya saappaanai nOkki: naan karththarin aalayaththilE nyaayappramaaNa puSthagaththaik kaNdu pidiththEn endru solli, andhap puSthagaththai saappaanidaththil koduththaan; avan adhai vaasiththaan.

9 appozhudhu sambiradhiyaagiya saappaan raajaavinidaththil vandhu, raajaavukku maRu uththaravu solli, aalayaththilE thogaiyittuk kaNda paNaththai umadhu adiyaar sErththuk katti, adhaik karththarudaiya aalayaththin vElaiyai visaarikkiRavargaL kaiyilE koduththaargaL endru sonnaan.
10 sambiradhiyaagiya saappaan pinnaiyum raajaavai nOkki: aasaariyanaagiya ilkkiyaa ennidaththil oru puSthagaththaik koduththaan endru aRiviththu, adhai raajaavukku munbaaga vaasiththaan.
11 raajaa nyaayappramaaNa puSthagaththin vaarththaigaLaik kEttapOdhu, than vaSthirangaLaik kizhiththukkoNdu,

12 aasaariyanaagiya ilkkiyaavukkum, saappaanin kumaaranaagiya akeekkaamukkum, migaayaavin kumaaranaagiya akpOrukkum, sambiradhiyaagiya saappaanukkum, raajaavin oozhiyakkaaranaagiya asaayaavukkum raajaa kattaLaiyittadhu:

13 kaNdedukkappatta indhap puSthagaththin vaarththaigaLinimiththam neengaL pOi, enakkaagavum janaththiRkaagavum yoodhaavanaiththiRkaagavum karththaridaththilvisaariyungaL; namakkaaga ezhudhiyirukkiRa ellaavatrinpadiyEyum seyya nammudaiya pidhaakkaL indhap puSthagaththin vaarththaigaLukku sevikodaadhapadiyinaal, nammEl patriyerindha karththarudaiya ukkiram periyadhu endraan.

14 appozhudhu aasaariyanaagiya ilkkiyaavum, akeekkaamum, akpOrum, saappaanum, asaayaavum, arkaasin kumaaranaagiya thikvaavin maganaana salloom ennum vaSthirasaalai visaarippukkaaran manaiviyaagiya uldhaaL ennum theerkkadharisiyaanavaLidaththiRkup pOi avaLOdE pEsinaargaL; avaL erusalEmin iraNdaam vaguppilE kudiyirundhaaL.
15 avaL avargaLai nOkki: ungaLai ennidaththil anuppinavaridaththil neengaL pOi: iSravElin dhEvanaagiya karththar uraikkiRadhu ennavendraal:
16 idhO, yoodhaavin raajaa vaasiththa puSthagaththin vaarththaigaLilellaam kaattiyirukkiRa pollaappai naan indha SthalaththinmElum, adhin kudigaLinmElum varappaNNuvEn.

17 avargaL ennaivittu, thangaL kaigaLin kiriyaigaL ellaavatrilum enakkuk kObamuNdaakka vERE dhEvargaLukkuth thoobankaattinapadiyinaal, en ukkiram indha SthalaththinmEl patriyeriyum; adhu avindhupOvadhu illaiyendru karththar sollugiRaar endru sollungaL.
18 karththaridaththil visaarikkiRadhaRku ungaLai anuppina yoodhaavin raajaavinidaththil neengaL pOi: neer kEtta vaarththaigaLaik kuRiththu iSravElin dhEvanaagiya karththar sollugiRadhu ennavendraal:

19 naan indha SthalaththiRkum adhin kudigaLukkum virOdhamaaga, avargaL paazhum saabamumaavaargaL endru sonnadhai nee kEttapOdhu, un irudhayam iLagi, neekarththarukku munbaaga unnai thaazhththi, un vaSthirangaLaik kizhiththuk koNdu, enakkumunbaaga azhudhapadiyinaal naanum un viNNappaththaik kEttEn.

20 aagaiyaal, idhO, naan unnai un pidhaakkaLaNdaiyilE sErththuk koLLuvEn; nee samaadhaanaththOdE un kallaRaiyil sErvaai; naan indha SthalaththinmEl varappaNNum sagala pollaappaiyum un kaNgaL kaaNbadhillai endru karththar sollugiRaar enbadhai sollungaL endraaL; indha maRu uththaravai avargaL pOi raajaavukku sonnaargaL.
